Name: Link Button
Description: The sample demonstrates how to Style a RadButton to look and behave like a Hyper-link button.
KeyWords: Link Button,  linkbutton, implicitstyles, visitedbehavior, hyperlink

Name: Toggle Switch Button
Description: This example demonstrates how to Style a RadToggleButton to look like a Toggle-Switch button. The buttons colors are inspired from VisualStudio2013, Office_Black and Office_Blue themes.
KeyWords: Toggle Switch Button,  radtogglebutton, visualstudio2013, style, implicitstyles, noxaml
